page.title: 13MOBILE SHOPS & DELIVERIES
page.content: Although there is only 1 permanent general stores in Denton,several mobile shops visit us.Most of the larger houses with long drives have a box at the end for daily deliveries of papers,milk & post.The local shop will deliver bread & groceries with the morning papers.{Vans}for wet fish,fish & chips & mobile{library}call once a week.A health food/wholefood van & a representative for a cleaning materials firm call once a month.2 mobile hairdressers will call at your home by appointment.Local farms with livestock have feed delivered from several different Mills.Chemical fertilizer in bags is also delivered. Housewives who order goods from{mail_ {order}catalogues have them delivered by independant carrier firms. {Milk}is collected from the dairy farms by bulk tanker daily.
